title: T206 SL HART graded SGC 5 $220 delivered
author: chernieto

posts.post_title: T206 SL HART graded SGC 5 $220 delivered
posts.post_content:
This is my first post on Net54. Been following for awhile & decided to dip my toes in, understanding the risk I am putting those toes into.
 
My Ebay ID is oldcard123. Please check out my feedback & let me know if you have any questions. My 1 and only negative feedback is pretty cool. I always try to sell cards at reasonable prices, under SMR -except for the Cobb's, Gehrig's etc.
Payment paypal or check or?
Let me know if your interested & thanks!
Paul
The Westlake sold---Hart Available
Thanks

peace

johnny

I put  a price on the Hart card- 
Thanks

wanted to let the net54 community know what a successful first bst transaction paul (chernieto)'s was with me!
I emailed an offer for the Westlake that was accepted, paid via paypal & the card was shipped the next day- well packaged & mailed certified.
thank you, paul, for making the deal so quick, easy & seamless.
best wishes with your future sales.
